stanza.line: To see his active child do deeds of (b)youth(/b)
So I made lame by Fortune's dearest (a)spite(/a)
Take all my comfort of thy worth and (b)truth(/b)
For whether beauty birth or wealth or (c)wit(/c)
Or any of these all or all or (d)more(/d)
Entitled in thy parts do crowned (c)sit(/c)
I make my love engrafted to this (d)store(/d)
So then I am not lame poor nor (e)despised(/e)
Whilst that this shadow doth such substance (f)give(/f)
That I in thy abundance am (e)sufficed(/e)
And by a part of all thy glory (f)live(/f)
Look what is best that best I wish in (g)thee(/g)
This wish I have then ten times happy (g)me(/g)
